title: In this thread, I rate the League of Legend Grills
body:
{{champion:103}}  2/10 - Ugly fox mutant monster. 

{{champion:84}}  8/10 - Athletic, honorable, and hot. Her side boobs got nerfed but who cares? 

{{champion:34}} 0/10 - is an ice bird thing 

{{champion:1}}  0/10 - is a little girl

{{champion:22}} 6/10 - bland personality. Voice is annoying as well 

{{champion:51}} 8/10 - hot accent, attractive, but bad dancer

{{champion:69}} 1/10 - is a snake monster. Upper half is okay, apart from the eyes and the forked tongue and that weird helmet thing. Maybe its not ok.

{{champion:131}} 5/10 - has some weird moon glowing tat on her forehead and no pupils. <_<

{{champion:60}} 5/10 - is a spider monster, but still attractive somewhat 

{{champion:28}} 6/10 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQlZweKNBjo

{{champion:114}} 9/10 - would've given her a 10/10 but since riot changed her face to make her look older and uglier than her old splash art, had to deduct a point. Athletic, strong hips, hot accent, nice hair. Still hot. 

{{champion:39}} 8/10 - has a nice body and personality, but is undead

{{champion:40}} 6/10 - has probably blown every guy in league of legends and dresses like a stripper. Some wouldn't have much issue with the latter, but I find it off-putting 

{{champion:222}} 6/10 - is insane and pale, but still kinda attractive 

{{champion:429}} 0/10 - is a ghost monster with multiple personality disorder

{{champion:43}} 5/10 - idk

{{champion:55}} 7/10 - is a murderous assassin and has an unsightly scar across her face, but is still attractive and would probably be amazing in bed. 

{{champion:10}} 4/10 religious zealot

{{champion:203}} 0/10 - i don't know wtf this thing even is

{{champion:7}} 10/10 - stunning, beautiful, and can split into two for a threesome if you're in the mood. 

{{champion:89}} 10/10 - probably the only league of legends girl that would be suitable for marriage in real life. Strong, but not femnazi strong, will defend you if you get in a bar fight or something, redhead, and not a slut. 

{{champion:127}} 1/10 - is a blind ice witch thing 

{{champion:117}} 0/10 - is some baby alien thing 

{{champion:99}} 7/10 - reminds me of a glee club president, and her laugh would probably get irritating. Is still attractive. 

{{champion:21}} 8/10 - has nice body, but is probably a slut like Janna. 

{{champion:25}} 6/10 - has elf ears, giant wings, and no pupils. Keeps ranting about revenge or something. obviously won't let you forget about something you've done wrong. 

{{champion:267}} 1/10 - is a fish mutant mermaid thing with some weird helmet. 

{{champion:76}}  1/10 - tree hugger furry

{{champion:61}} 1/10 - is a robot. Rick Deckard from Blader Runner had sex with one, so she gets a point for the possibility. 

{{champion:78}} 0/10 - is some angry alien midget with a hammer 

{{champion:133}} 6/10 - more focused on her work than anything, but has a nice body

{{champion:92}}  5/10 - probably a major downer at parties/get-togethers, but is still attractive somewhat. Also screams and grunts a lot. 

{{champion:113}} 6/10 - dominatrix 

{{champion:102}} 0/10 - is a dragon monster thing 

{{champion:15}} 6/10 - grunts too much and will probably throw things at you if you make her mad

{{champion:37}} 10/10 - great body, hair, eyes, complexion, can play music during parties or when you're both alone to set the mood, no grating/annoying voice.

{{champion:16}} 0/10 - is a goat thing with too many tat's

{{champion:134}} 6/10 - obsessed with power and has weird helmet with glowing purple eyes, but has nice thighs

{{champion:18}} 0/10 - is a midget alien thing 

{{champion:67}} 5/10 - more focused on her job 

{{champion:254}} 9/10 - strong, loyal, and has a nice body, but her haircut is stupid and she tattoo'd her name on her face so might not have a lot of intelligence

{{champion:143}} 0/10 - is a plant monster.
